abstract: Highlights from choreographer and soloist Justin Peck's first-ever narrative ballet for New York City Ballet, called The Most Incredible Thing, noted.

headline.print_headline: On Stage; A Fairy Tale Brought to Life
headline.main: Behind the Scenes at This Season’s Most-Talked-About New Ballet

snippet: “The Most Incredible Thing,” which premiered last night, was created by the wunderkind choreographer Justin Peck along with Marcel Dzama and Bryce Dessner.
lead_paragraph: “The Most Incredible Thing,” which premiered last night, was created by the wunderkind choreographer Justin Peck along with Marcel Dzama and Bryce Dessner.
